content: in each of the next 16 single_crochet 55 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet place marker into this st single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of the next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of the next 20 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of the next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of the next 19 single_crochet 59 single_crochet round 6 work this round in front loops only single_crochet in flo around round 7 this and all remaining rnds are to be worked in both loops half_double_crochet in each single_crochet around round 8 single_crochet in each half_double_crochet around at the end of the round work a slip_stitch into the beginning single_crochet and finish off weave in your tails ears make two using a size l hook and brown yarn create a magic_ring chain 1 work 5 single_crochet in the ring chain 1 half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet chain 1 pull ring to close join to beginning single_crochet finish off leaving a tail for sewing snout using a size 2 5 mm crochet hook and cotton yarn create a magic_ring chain 1 round 1 work 10 single_crochet in magic_ring pull the ring to tighten round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 single_crochet rnds 3-6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around at the end of last round slip_stitch in next st and finish off being sure to leave a long tail for sewing 3 bear eyeglass holder www hodgepodge-crochet com assembly place ears onto the top of the holder in the desired place and stitch down i like to stitch through the center of the ear directly through the top of the holder as shown in the photos below place snout onto bottom of the holder in the desired place and stitch down i like to stitch the snout so that it s rounded over the holder as shown in the photos below be sure to stuff with polyfill before sewing shut with black cotton yarn embroider nose as shown below add your safety eyes use photo for guide or place where desired your final product might be a bit floppy that is normal just use your fingers to mold the yarn into place until it s perfect enjoy your new bear eyeglass holder 4 bear eyeglass holder
